Me encantaría poner un análisis positivo de este pedazo de juego...pero creo que ha perdido la esencia con tanto "call of duty" sobre la revelión y eso...me lo he pasado en dificil y no he tenido sensación de supervivencia ni "secretos"...mucho disparo y bastante claro por donde debes ir...
Sinceramente, el HL1 es una obra maestra, y este, teniendo en cuenta la época, es una maravilla...
pero a la sombra del 1º.
Que cada 1 piense lo q le salga de su sistema reproductor o excretor pero este es mi put0 comentario.

Проходя Half-life 2 и все эпизоды,я понял,что не зря потратил 18 часов,чтобы пройти ее снова.Здесь есть все для счастья,а именно:
   +Хорошая графика и физика(на 2004 год-это было просто ОГОНЬ!)
   +Первоклассный хоррор
   +Великолепная озвучка персонажей
   +Незабываемая атмосфера
   +Отличный сюжет
   +Неплохой ассортимент оружия.
Минусов в этой игре нет!
Про игру не вижу смысла рассказывать,т.к каждый в нее играл,а если ты еще не прошел игру,то чего ты ждешь?Быстро покупай и проходи!
Оценка: 10/10

[h1]Vou ser direto[/h1]
Um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei na minha vida, simplesmente perfeito.
[b]10/10[/b]

Класика. Давным давно проходил на пиратке, записывал на диски и мо временем забыл. Но вот, вижу вальве комплит пак со всеми ХЛ и думаю, что стоит добавить себе это чудо игровой индустрии. На одном дыхании прошел ХЛ2, Еп1, Еп2, маленькую комнату Лост Кост, которая не была включена в оригинальный ХЛ2. Масса удовольствия и ностальгии. Замечалось то, чего я не замечал ранее, выстраивались логические цепочки. Сейчас я не понимаю кто такой Джимен. Так как в конце ХЛ2 он говорит "Я растворяюсь", а в конце Лост Кост рыбак говорит "Вы растворяетесь, мистер Фримен..."

Одним словом, ждем ХЛ3.

Um dos melhores jogos já lançados para o PC, chega a ser surpreendente que seja um jogo lançado ainda na sexta geração, muito por causa de seus gráficos. Uma pena ele não ser lançado na época para o Playstation 2 (acredito que pelo Hardware do PS2), pois ele seria muito mais conhecido.

Half life 2 yani bilmeyen yoktur . Source motoruyla yapılan oyun senaryosuyla oynanışıyla zaten sarıyor. Şuanda 1.80 kesinlikle alın fakat yanında episode 1 ve zorla çıkartılan episode 2'yi de almalısınız çünkü hikaye bitmiyor. Downfall adlı bir modu ve half life 2 update diye bir olay var. Bu update oyunun grafiklerini güzelleştiriyor.

Artıları: Bu oyunu anlatıcak kelime bulamıyorum. Yani en iyi kelime "MUHTEŞEM" olurdu. Bu arada gravity gun herzamanki gibi havalı ve müthiş

Eksileri: Eğer Bu ilk baştaki incelemeyi okuduysanız burayı okumazsanız okursanızda herhangi birşey bulamadım.
je devé le fair avc un kop1 mé il a rush le jeu car c un nazi

Honestly for me its one of the best single player games out there even thought it was released in around ~2004 it's still better than most of the games releasing today. It's realy cathcy VALVE did a great job by dropping this. In total I have over 50 hours in this games with my other accounts as I play it over and over again it never gets boring. I own other two episodes and it looks like the ending is not finished, it needs something more spicy.

I really don't know why are VALVE not dropping the 3rd episode as promised, (It's been over 10 years and we still don't have it) they would make a crap load of money. 

Anyway my final rating for this is 9.9/10. I would give it a 10/10 but because of the missing 3rd episode sadly I just cannot.

If you somehow don't own/have this in your library you're missing out a lot go buy it right now. As of today the price is 
 is crazy low (-90% off) so it costs like 1euro I bought it for 10 without any sales and I do not regret it in any possible way.

Thanks for reading my review to the bottom :D

Ok...

A classic from 2009. I only paid .99 for it, too. 

It's a bit dated by today's standards, but fun nonetheless. Unique story, some interesting weapons. Only two little nitpicky things I have to complain about.

1. The airboating chapter to the story is extremely long and uneventful. Frankly, the creators could've eliminated this part alltogether and it would've made the game more enjoyable.

2. Sometimes it's not always obvious what the objectives are or where you have to go. Seems like a simple addition to the HUD could've eliminated this problem.

Still, definitely worth buying.
Einfach ein genialer Klassiker von dem sich viele aktuelle Spiele eine Scheibe abschneiden können. Ist sehr gut gealtert!

This is the most amazing story telling game I've ever played. From the start it gets you very hooked with the creepy intro of the "gman". This title has very well made puzzles and dialogue that never gets boring. I truly enjoy this game and it's a shame valve won't release a third half life title. Still, amazing game with fantastic and fun physics!

Half-Life 2 is an amazing game. It has aged well knowing that It's on the market since 2004. I didn't have the chance to play this game before, and going through it right now is absolutely fun.

And the various of mods it has makes the game even more open.
nice game!!))

Thank god I bought this only for one euro on sale. I was really disappointed. Physics and 3D enviroment are really odd, often I would bump on something or slip for no reason. The AI of support later in game is just horrible, they are more annoying than real help. And worst of all the game is incredibly buggy. Several times I had to use cheat to advance (like when I could not climb a ladder which was only way out) I ended playing when I could not advance in progress despite doing exactly what was wanted from me, there are billion better action games, why waste time on this? Yeah cult classic .. idc.

Un must-have firmato Valve, con meccaniche di gioco valide, motore grafico che soddisfa ancora pienamente, (nonostante i molti anni di servizio all'attivo), e giocabilità buona.
La trama si riallaccia al primo capitolo della saga, Half Life, che è consigliabile giocare prima in modo da conoscere i retroscena e il backgroud in cui si staglia la storia di questo HL2.

the game of mine childhood <3

一句话概括：这是一部超越了2004年游戏制作整体水平的世界级作品，他承载的是80后和90后孩提时代的回忆。
如今被工作和生活渐渐磨平棱角的我们，是否还能回想起儿时挤在你身边看你打半条命的小伙伴们？
现在，2017年，让我们跟随戈登弗里曼博士，杀回十三年前那单纯而欢乐的时光吧！

The game has aged. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. The controls are a bit of nightmare at times. Morgan glides around at times. It still has some platforming elements that they hadn't quite figured out yet that they weren't suited for first person. Other than that the story is great. Even now it feels as though developers really pushed the boundaries. For 50 cents this game is definitely worth a play.
